titles.title: RS160 O come, all ye faithful

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1 v6 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
O come, all ye faithful,
Joyful and triumphant,
O come ye, o come ye to Bethlehem;
Come and behold Him
Born the King of angels:

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
True God of true God,
Light of Light eternal,
Lo! He abhors not the Virgin's womb,
Son of the Father,
Begotten, not created:

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
See how the shepherds
summoned to the cradle
leaving their flocks, draw high to gaze,
we too will thither
bend our joyful footsteps.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Lo, star-led chieftains,
magi, Christ adoring,
offer him incense, gold and myrrh;wwe to the Christ-child
bring our hearts oblations:

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Sing, choirs of angels,
Sing in exultation,
Sing, all ye citizens of heaven above,
Glory to God
In the highest:
Oh come, let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Yea, Lord, we greet Thee,
Born this happy morning;
Jesus, to Thee be glory given,
Word of the Father,
Now in flesh appearing:
Oh come, let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
O come, let us adore Him,
Christ the Lord.
